TopicTitle: VAB: open solar panels or other moveable parts

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

like the landing struts, I would like to open/deploy the solar panels within the VAB just to have a overview of "used" space and also for designing crafts/stations. It's really annoying if I deploy my solar panels in space and see that they are covering each other. I hope this is n issue for you guys, too.
Agreed. I've gotten in the habit of jumping out to the Launch Pad and using an action group to "deploy all" to ensure I've got tolerances; that can be quite repetitive!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64711-0-23-TweakableEverything-For-all-your-part-tweaking-needs

There is a mod available that does precisely this! I do agree it should probably come stock (like almost every mod, but that's for another discussion), but at least for now there's a work around.

Right click on the panel and select "Start Deployed", which, iirc, is the only tweakable panels have.

Edit: Sorry, I'm so used to the mod suggested above that I thought this functionality came stock.

Edited February 27, 2014 by xrayfishx

I'd like to see this implemented into the stock game. It's fairly often that I see an animated part and think "will that fit?" and try to extend it but can't. It's not so much frustrating as it is a grind, but it'd be a nice little thing. I think this is being done anyway in 0.24, but don't quote me on that.
agreed. annoying having gear or solar panel clip something else
The tweakable system is still in development and will continue to be fleshed out.
